DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate the effect on ambulatory blood pressure of lumiracoxib 100 mg once daily versus ibuprofen 600 mg three times a day in osteoarthritis patients with controlled hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Lumiracoxib in Patients With Osteoarthritis and With Controlled Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritis of the hand, hip, knee or spine High blood pressure (<140/ 90 mmHg) which is controlled by antihypertensive medication(s).
